sentences.sContent: But studies have shown that high-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters on most jets today can capture 99.97% of bacterial and virus-carrying particles.
sentences.sContent_eng: But studies have shown that high-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters on most jets today can capture 99.97% of bacterial and virus-carrying particles.
sentences.sCn: 但研究表明，如今大部分飞机上的高效微粒空气过滤器能够滤掉99.97%的细菌和病毒微粒。

trans.tranCn: 粒子状的，微粒的，颗粒的

trans.tranOther: Particulates are very small particles of a substance, especially those that are produced when fuel is burned
